question: Let f(a) be the first derivative of -a**4/4 - 8*a**3/3 - 7*a**2/2 + 3*a - 1. Calculate f(-7).
Let f(n) = -n**3 - 7*n**2 - 6*n + 4. Suppose l - 19 = 2. Suppose 38 = -5*z + 13, l = 4*m - z. Suppose o + 2*x + 8 = -m, -3*o = 4*x + 30. Give f(o).
Suppose -4*c + 9*c + 31 = 4*s, 4 = s. Let i(v) = -2*v**2 - 3. What is i(c)?
Suppose 2*d - 7*d - 30 = 0. Let z = 4 + d. Let o(l) = -l**3 + 3 + 4*l**2 + 3*l - 2*l**2 - l**2. Calculate o(z).
Let n(h) be the second derivative of 0 - h + 1/3*h**3 - h**2 - 1/4*h**4. Determine n(2).
Suppose -5*f = 3*n - 11, 5*n - n + 24 = 3*f. Let o(i) = i - 1. What is o(f)?
Let u(t) = -t**3 + t**2 - t - 2. Suppose 24 = 2*i + 4*k, i - 2*i - k + 7 = 0. Let f = i - 2. Give u(f).
Let k(g) = 2*g**2 + 1. Let c be 3/7 - (-34)/(-14). Calculate k(c).
Let t(h) be the second derivative of 3*h**5/10 - h**4/12 + 4*h. Give t(-1).
Let o(k) be the third derivative of -1/24*k**4 + 0*k + 0 + k**3 - 5*k**2. Give o(0).
Let d(b) be the second derivative of -b**5/10 - b**4/12 + b**2/2 - 34*b - 2. Determine d(1).
Let c = 5 - 5. Suppose -5*k - 5*w + 25 = 0, -5*w + 17 = -c*k - 3*k. Let d be -3 + k - -3 - 6. Let t(u) = u**3 + 6*u**2 + 4*u - 5. Calculate t(d).
Let w(n) be the first derivative of n**5/20 + n**4/3 - n**2/2 - 2*n + 3. Let x(s) be the first derivative of w(s). Give x(-4).
Let x(o) be the second derivative of -o**4/4 - o**3/2 - o**2/2 - 24*o. Determine x(-2).
Let d be -1*2*(5 + -3). Let a = d - -5. Let g(u) be the third derivative of -u**4/24 - u**2. Calculate g(a).
Let h(c) be the second derivative of c**5/10 + c**4/12 - c**3/6 - c**2/2 - 159*c - 1. Let g be (-2)/(-1*1*-1). What is h(g)?
Suppose 26 = -2*b + 16. Let r(d) = d**2 + 4*d - 3. Calculate r(b).
Let d(t) be the second derivative of t**3/3 + 5*t**2 + 25*t. Give d(-9).
Let r = 113 + -110. Let b(w) = w**2 + w. What is b(r)?
Suppose 6 = -3*a - q, -2*a + 3*q + 6 = a. Let w(l) = 8*l**3 + l. Determine w(a).
Let m(b) = b**2 + 6*b + 1. Let g be 3*3/(-11 - -2). Let v = 2 + g. Suppose -v = -3*f + 4*z - 2, 5*f - 2*z + 11 = 0. Determine m(f).
Let q(v) = -v**3 + 0*v + 2*v**2 - 3 + 2*v**2 + 2*v**2 - 5*v. Suppose 5*n = -0*n + 15. Suppose s - 27 = -2*r - n*r, s = -3*r + 17. Determine q(r).
Let q(n) be the first derivative of -1 + 0*n - 1/180*n**6 + 0*n**5 - 1/3*n**3 + 1/12*n**4 + 0*n**2. Let p(m) be the third derivative of q(m). Determine p(-2).
Let m(g) = -18*g - 2. Let c be m(-1). Let x = 15 - c. Let v(i) be the third derivative of 7*i**5/60 + i**4/24 + i**3/6 - i**2. What is v(x)?
Let y(c) = c**3 - 10*c**2 + 10*c - 13. Let t(u) = -u**3 - 4*u**2 - u + 5. Let j be t(-4). Let x be y(j). Let f(m) = -m**3 - 5*m**2 - 4*m - 3. What is f(x)?
Let d = -3 - -2. Let b(l) be the second derivative of 1/12*l**4 + 0 + 0*l**2 + 1/6*l**3 - l. Determine b(d).
Let k(h) = 4*h - 5. Let f(c) = 5*c - 5. Let o(l) = -3*f(l) + 4*k(l). Determine o(4).
Let d(o) = -o**2 + 10*o - 2. Let b be 1/(111/27 - 4). What is d(b)?
Let t(f) be the second derivative of f**5/20 - f**4/2 + f**3 + 6*f. What is t(5)?
Let t(n) = -n - 1. Let c(l) = -5*l - 6. Let d(i) = i**2 - 10*i - 12. Let u be d(11). Let k(o) = u*c(o) + 6*t(o). Calculate k(5).
Suppose r - 2 = -g, -9 + 4 = 2*r - g. Let u(o) = o**3 - 2*o - 1. Give u(r).
Let j(z) = -z + 6. Let s(v) = -v + 6. Let g(f) = 3*j(f) - 2*s(f). What is g(-5)?
Let d = -40 - -45. Let b(p) = p**2 - 7*p. Give b(d).
Let x(y) = -3*y**3 + y. Let o = -14 + 23. Suppose 2*m + 9 = 1, n + o = -2*m. What is x(n)?
Let f(d) = 1. Let m(c) = -2*c + 0*c**2 + 6 - c**3 - 3 + 6*c**2. Let x(r) = 6*f(r) + m(r). Determine x(6).
Let v(r) = -r - 3. Let n be v(-7). Suppose n*y - 33 = -5*p + 2*y, 5*y = 5*p - 40. Let g(c) = -c + 7. Give g(p).
Let j(k) = k - 1. Let b be 4/22 + (-184)/44. Determine j(b).
Suppose 20*x - 19*x + 7 = 0. Let w(r) = -r**3 - 6*r**2 + 7*r - 6. Determine w(x).
Suppose -3*c - 2*b = 2, -14 = -5*c - 0*c + b. Let w(g) = 1 + g + c*g + 5 - 3. What is w(-5)?
Let d(q) = q**2 + 8*q + 2. Suppose 8*s + 29 + 27 = 0. Determine d(s).
Let q(s) = -4*s + 2. Suppose -2*z - 10 - 2 = 0. Let v be (-8)/z + (-14)/(-21). Determine q(v).
Let u(v) be the second derivative of -v**4/6 - v**3/6 + v**2/2 - 3*v. Let b(r) = -r**2 - 3*r + 2. Let n be b(2). Let d be 2*2*(-2)/n. Determine u(d).
Let h(x) = x**3 - 6*x**2 + 6*x - 10. Let l(u) = u - 1. Let q(i) = h(i) - 6*l(i). Give q(6).
Let r(n) be the third derivative of n**5/15 - n**4/24 + n**3/6 + 4*n**2. Let f be r(1). Let u(l) = l**3 - 4*l**2 - 2*l + 4. Determine u(f).
Suppose -7 = -4*g + x, -23 = -5*g - 3*x + 7. Let h be 1/4 + (-38)/(-8). Suppose l - h + g = 0. Let b(d) = -2*d**3 + d**2 + d. Determine b(l).
Let h(k) be the third derivative of 1/6*k**3 - 1/15*k**5 + 0 + 0*k**4 + 7*k**2 + 0*k. Determine h(-1).
Let k(i) be the second derivative of i**3/2 - 2*i**2 + 4*i. Calculate k(6).
Let w(v) = -3*v**3. Let t be w(1). Let i(s) = s**2 + 3*s + 2. Calculate i(t).
Let w(q) = -q**2 + 6*q - 5. Suppose 6*u = u + 30. Calculate w(u).
Let f(v) = -14*v - 1. Suppose 3*b + 10 = 13. Calculate f(b).
Let u(x) = -9*x**3 + x + 1. Suppose 4*r = 4*o - 16, 4*r + o = -0*r + 4. Let g be 2/(-4)*2 + r. Calculate u(g).
Let r = -13 + 15. Let z(b) = 4*b - 1. Let s(k) be the third derivative of k**4/6 - k**3/3 - 2*k**2. Let y(x) = r*s(x) - 3*z(x). What is y(2)?
Suppose 16 = 5*g + 2*t + t, 0 = -3*g - 2*t + 10. Let k(y) = -1 - 24*y + 24*y + 7*y**g. Let i be (2 - 1)*(-1 - 0). Calculate k(i).
Let l = -7 - -7. Suppose 3*z - 1 = 4*f - l, -2 = -z + f. Let b(d) = 4*d - 3 - d**2 + z + 3. What is b(5)?
Let x be 1 - (-5 + 1 + 0). Let l(t) = -3*t - 3 - t - 2*t + x*t + t**2. Let a be l(3). Let w(v) = v**2 - v - 1. Give w(a).
Let a(i) be the first derivative of -i**2/2 + 9*i + 4. Let b be a(8). Let r(m) = m. Give r(b).
Let r(i) = i**3 - 3*i - 1. Let g(z) = -z + 1. Let w(q) = -2*g(q) + r(q). Suppose -2 = k, 2*k - 10 = 4*s + 7*k. Calculate w(s).
Let f(m) = -m**2 + 5*m + 3. Let i be f(6). Let h(k) = 3*k + 0*k - 2 + k**2 - 1 + 5. Give h(i).
Let m(x) = -x**3 + 7*x**2 + 9*x - 3. Let a be m(8). Suppose -4*j = -6*j + 4. Let s(v) = v**3 - 7*v**j + 0 - 3 + 2*v**2. What is s(a)?
Let g(p) = -p**2 - 9*p + 1. Let a(w) = -w**2 - 10*w + 1. Let y(h) = 4*a(h) - 5*g(h). What is y(-6)?
Let l(z) = -2*z - 3. Let q(y) = 2 - 4 + 3. Let h(j) = -l(j) - 4*q(j). Let c(b) = b**2 + 9*b + 11. Let m be c(-8). Calculate h(m).
Let b = -23 + 41. Let q be (-2)/9 + 4/b. Let g(s) = 5*s + 12. Let d(r) = 2*r + 6. Let l(c) = 7*d(c) - 3*g(c). Give l(q).
Let s(l) = -l**3 - 8. Let r(o) = o**2 + 4*o + 4. Let v be r(-3). Let q = -1 + v. Give s(q).
Let v(m) = -3*m. Let a be (-30)/(-8) + (-1)/(-4). Suppose a*g - 2*o = -68, 0*g - 3*o = g + 3. Let b(n) = 21*n. Let j(q) = g*v(q) - 2*b(q). What is j(-1)?
Let n(a) be the second derivative of a**3/6 - 4*a**2 + 10*a. Let o = 7 - 3. What is n(o)?
Let z(y) = -y**2 + 5*y + 9. Let c(o) = -2*o**2 + 11*o + 19. Suppose 0 = 6*b - b - 45. Let l(f) = b*z(f) - 4*c(f). What is l(0)?
Let r(o) = -o - 7. Suppose -4*i = -3*k + 39, 3*k + 49 = -5*i + 7*k. Give r(i).
Suppose 0 = -4*l - 12, -5*l + l = 4*m + 32. Let v(c) = c - 3. Let r(q) = -q + 3. Let j(a) = -2*r(a) - 3*v(a). What is j(m)?
Let d(f) = -3*f**2 + 3*f - 17. Let i(j) = 2*j**2 - j + 9. Let p(o) = -3*d(o) - 5*i(o). Determine p(-6).
Suppose -f + 1 - 3 = 0. Let i(l) = -l**2 - 2*l + 1. What is i(f)?
Suppose -12 = 4*w, -y + 3*w = y - 27. Let t(k) = -2*k + y - 3*k - 18. Let j(b) = 6*b + 10. Let l(o) = -6*j(o) - 7*t(o). Determine l(0).
Let b(y) = y**2 - 1. Let v be b(-2). Suppose -2*t - 4 = -z, 0 = 2*z + v*z - 2*t - 12. Let j(h) = 0 - 2 - 2 + h**z + 5. Determine j(0).
Let w(f) be the third derivative of 1/3*f**3 - 3*f**2 + 0 + 0*f + 0*f**4 - 1/60*f**5. Give w(-3).
Let r(q) be the third derivative of -q**4/24 - 2*q**3/3 + q**2. Let n(m) = -m**2 + 10*m - 6. Let s be (1 - 3) + 4*3. Let a be n(s). Give r(a).
Suppose 6 + 9 = 5*k. Let p(o) = -2*o + k*o + 3 + o. Give p(-2).
Let t(o) be the third derivative of o**6/15 - o**5/60 + o**4/12 - o**3/6 - 106*o**2. Suppose -8 = 2*c, 0*b = -b + c + 2. Let i be 1*(b + 2 + 1). Give t(i).
Let b(o) = 3*o + 3. Let v be b(-3). Let a(h) = -h + 7. Give a(v).
Let r(x) = x - 3*x + 6 - x. Let d(t) = -t**2 + 7*t + 4. Let y be d(6). Let h = y + -6. Determine r(h).
Suppose -g + 13 = 5*f + 3, 22 = -3*f + 5*g. Suppose 5*l - 10 = -0*l. Let j(m) = -m + 0*m**2 + 0*m**2 + 2*m**l - 2*m**3. Calculate j(f).
Let w(a) = a**3 + 6*a**2 - 2*a - 3. Let h be (-62)/10 + 3/15. Calculate w(h).
Let l(b) = b**2 + b + 1. Let g be 31/(-3) - (-16)/(-24). Let q = 10 + g. What is l(q)?
Let b(a) = a + 1. Let q = 13 - 4. Let y = 5 - q. Give b(y).
Suppose s - 4*s + 6 = 0. Let g be 0*s/(6 + 2). Let a(c) = c**3 - c**2 - c - 5. Give a(g).
Let u(c) be the third derivative of -3*c**2 + 0*c - 1/24*c**4 - 5/6*c**3 + 0. Give u(5).
Let z(q) = q**3 + 4*q**2 - 4. Let g be z(-4). Let y(m) be the second derivative of m**4/12 + m**3/2 - 3*m**2/2 + 8*m. What is y(g)?
